means: （南非）克瓦桑语族（包括霍屯督语 Hottentot 和布须曼语 Bushman）

sentence.Network_en: Many scientists consider the Khoisan a distinct race of very ancient origin.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多科学家认为(南非)克瓦桑族是一支独特的民族,渊源非常久远.

sentence.Network_en: Populations of Bantu - language speakers who live in southern Africa today are far darker than the Khoisan.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在在南非,说班图话的族群,比郭依桑人黑多了.

sentence.Network_en: They show that the Khoisan may be a very ancient mix of Asians and black Africans.
sentence.Network_cn: 基因研究表明科伊桑人可能是古代西亚人与非洲黑人的混血.

means.word_mean: 1. a family of languages spoken in southern Africa

auth_sentence.content: It's been well known that the Khoisan or Bushmen have some of the oldest genetic lineages in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's been well known that the Khoisan or Bushmen have some of the oldest genetic lineages in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's been well known that the Khoisan or Bushmen have some of the oldest genetic lineages in the world.
